Text: good but something is wrong with the audio playing on vlc and ps3
Why am I only seeing total play of 54 minutes if it's "Full Match"?
It might just be my setup, but I get a LOT of crackling sounds on both my TV and on my computer-system. :-/
It's not your setup... the audio is shit.
the video is not great either

Here is how to make the audio a little more bearable: 

Right click on VLC's screen.
Go to Audio -> Audio Device
Change it no Mono.

There is still some crackling but its much better than before.
